entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
